Automatically clear out messages older t: Automatically clear out messages that have been in Trash or Spam for over 30 days. Enjoy this and other benefits when you upgrade.

Accounts with custom domains cannot join: Accounts with custom domains cannot join a Visionary or family plan.

A recovery file lets you unlock and view: A recovery file lets you unlock and view your data after account recovery
Ask your organisation admin to setup Gat: Ask your organization admin to set up Gateways.

If you lose your password and need to re: If you lose your password and need to recover your account, ${ boldImperative } that you have an ${ boldAccountRecovery } in place.

If you lose your password and need to recover your account, ${ boldImperative } that you have both an ${ boldAccountAndRecovery } in place, otherwise you might not be able to access any of your emails, contacts, or files.
The link to report that that you didn't: The link to report that you didn't set up a ${ BRAND_NAME } Account has expired. Please get in touch with our support team to resolve this issue.
You can enable authentication sign in to: You can enable authentication logs to see when your account is accessed, and from which IP. We will record the IP address that accesses the account and the time, as well as failed attempts.
You won’t be able to recover locked data: You won’t be able to recover locked data using your downloaded recovery files. This will also void trusted device recovery information.
